name: ucf-webapp
description: 开发思路：[大型企业应用在前端微应用视角下的思考](https://github.com/iuap-design/blog/issues/306)

scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node writeIndex.js && ucf-scripts start --homepage=demos#/Button
scripts.server: cross-env NODE_ENV=server node writeIndex.js && ucf-scripts start --homepage=demos#/Button
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=server node writeIndex.js && ucf-scripts build

author: Yonyou FED
